member.name: T:DMS_InstDirScanner.clsMgrSettings
member.summary: Class for loading, storing and accessing manager parameters.
member.remarks: Loads initial settings from local config file, then checks to see if remainder of settings should be loaded or manager set to inactive. If manager active, retrieves remainder of settings from manager parameters database.

member.summary: Constructor

member.summary: Loads manager settings from config file and database
member.returns: True if successful; False on error

member.summary: Loads the initial settings from application config file
member.returns: String dictionary containing initial settings if suceessful; NOTHING on error

member.summary: Tests initial settings retrieved from config file

member.summary: Gets remaining manager config settings from config database; Overload to use module-level string dictionary when calling from external method
member.returns: True for success; False for error
